response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our unique and valuable product to you. Given its worth to us, we're offering it to you at a special price considering its value to you. We kindly invite you to consider acquiring this product for $12,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing our earnings and ensuring you receive a fair deal. We believe this offer presents an excellent opportunity for both parties.", "product_price": 12000}
